blogData.title: What Arabic Voices are Available?
blogData.description:
In this article we're looking at our Arabic speaking AI and the different
  voices available. We look at what Male and Female Arabic AI's sound like. Have a
  listen!
blogData.keywords: ai transcription, ai translation, ai translator, ai localization, AI, translation, machine learning, growth, Artificial Intelligence, prediction, ai dubbing, ai voice overs, ai reader, synthetic speech, male arabic voice, female arabic voice, arabic dialects, youtube subtitles, video caption, youtube captions

data.richContent:
Previously we’ve gone through the list of our English speaking AI and the different dialects they speak. You can see them all here.

In this article we’re looking at our Arabic speaking AI and the different dialects and voices available.

If you need a reminder as to how to select the appropriate AI language and dialect, check out our article here.

Now, on to the voices!
We’ve used the phrase birds of a feather, flock together or الطيور على أشكالها تقع for our AI to say each time for the examples.

What voices are available in Arabic?

Below you can listen to each voice provided in Arabic on our app:

Midlife Female (S)

Midlife Female §

Midlife Male §

Midlife Male (S)

Young-Adult Male §

Young-Adult Male (S)

Conclusion

And there you have it! Examples of all the AI Arabic voives that are currently available on the videotranslator.ai app. Stay tuned as we continue to update our database and for further articles displaying our AI in other languages and dialects.

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!

We are very grateful for your support!

If you are interested in trying out our technology, please try our platform or drop us an email at hello@videotranslator.ai.

nodes.title: Leaving A Long-Lasting Legacy: Curating Your Family’s History
nodes.description: Join us as we tell the story of Jeff Dormish, who wants to pass on his family history to his children as part of his legacy, and how he inspired the Video Translator team.
nodes.coverAlt: Meninggalkan Warisan Jangka Panjang: Mengurasi Sejarah Keluarga Anda

nodes.title: Transcribing A Video: How Do I Know Which Dialect To Choose?
nodes.description: Ever get confused on which dialect you should choose when you are translating a video using our tool? This article will help you choose the right dialect!
nodes.coverAlt: Transcribing A Video: How Do I Know Which Dialect To Choose?

nodes.title: The Implications Of AI Adoption In Our Tools
nodes.description: AI transcription is now a standard feature in productivity toolkits. What does this mean for your business?
nodes.coverAlt: The Implications Of AI Adoption In Our Tools
